name: Pork Roast/Surkaal
steps: Cut/shred cabbage into thin slivers. Peel, core and cut into 8ths. In a large pot put the cabbage and apples in with water, apple cider vinegar, sugar and caraway seeds.
Cover and bring to a boil. Simmer, stirring regularly for 30-45 min on medium high heat or until completely cooked and apple wedges fall apart. Taste and adjust with vinegar and sugar.
*I love it when the cabbage cooks with meat Becky. So if I make this on it's own I add either a beef bouillon or some broth. It is great with any meat ... really good with Brats.
